title: Boars and Bakers
summary: Picking up right after the rat battle, the party barely had time to catch their breath before escaped boars rampaged through town. Ekran was knocked unconscious, but the party prevailed. They then met the eccentric gnome baker Millhouse and his magical pastries.

best_moments.title: Stupid Floor
best_moments.description: Belden's reflection on the rat battle summed up his experience perfectly.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Belden, after this rat battle, what is going through his mind?

best_moments.title: Borby's Rampage
best_moments.description: The escaped boars were given names, and Borby was out for blood.

best_moments.title: Ekran Goes Down
best_moments.description: Borby charged Ekran and knocked him unconscious with a brutal tusk attack.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: As you're standing there, the boar charges into you, bores into you, and knocks you unconscious to the ground.

best_moments.title: Sacred Flame Kill
best_moments.description: Semaj finished off Borby with divine fire.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: Samaj, how would you like to describe this kill?

quotes.speaker: Semaj
quotes.text: After seeing what it did to Ekren and seeing Belden hit it, but it still being wounded, I didn't want it to go any further, so I just went, take care of it. A little bit of flair.

best_moments.title: Periwinkle's Panic
best_moments.description: The tiefling butcher went after the already-dead boar with his cleavers.

quotes.speaker: GM
quotes.text: You're going to see Periwinkle run up to this boar right here and he's going to take out his cleavers and just start chopping at it thinking it's not all the way dead.

quotes.speaker: Belden
quotes.text: This is no time to be cooking.

best_moments.title: Am I the Only One Hanging On?
best_moments.description: Kaelia's near-death experience with the rats made her acutely aware of her fragility.

quotes.speaker: Kaelia
quotes.text: Am I the only one hanging on by a thread here?

Belden cracked ribs with his warhammer

moments: Out of spell slots from rat battle

moments: Still thinking about the stupid floor
Charged out of the butcher shop

npcs_met.description: Tiefling butcher at the Bloody Butcher shop
npcs_met.notable: Rewarded the party with extra meat and a healing potion

npcs_met.name: Millhouse
npcs_met.description: Eccentric gnome baker who infuses magic into his pastries

plot_developments: Defeated escaped boars rampaging through Neverwinter
Collected supplies from the Bloody Butcher (Periwinkle)
Met Millhouse the magical gnome baker
Learned about Stonehill Inn and Edermath's Orchard in Phandalin
Heard about Eldren's Enchantments magic shop
Returned to Driftwood Tavern to rest before departure
